# (PART) APPENDIX {#appendix} 

# `individual.R`


This file should contain your processing workflow and be saved at:

**`data-raw/individual.R`**

Create the file using:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
usethis::use_data_raw("individual")
```

Your script should contain:

```{r, eval=FALSE, code=readLines("data-raw/individual.R")}

```
